data.taskTitle: IDE: Dynamic form rendering from plugin configFields and filter UI from itemFields
IDE: Dynamic form rendering from plugin configFields and filter UI from itemFields
data.approach: Create DynamicConfigForm.svelte and FilterBuilder.svelte components, then integrate into IngestWizard. DynamicConfigForm extracts the inline pluginFieldInput snippet into a reusable component supporting all 6 field types. FilterBuilder builds filter conditions from itemFields metadata with type-aware operator constraints.

data.taskTitle: IDE: Dynamic form rendering from plugin configFields and filter UI from itemFields
summary: Created DynamicConfigForm.svelte - renders all 6 configField types with secret management
Created FilterBuilder.svelte - type-aware filter condition builder from itemFields
Integrated both into IngestWizard with dynamic Filters step for all source types
Wired filter data through save/load/review flows
Created DynamicConfigForm component supporting 6 field types
Created FilterBuilder component with type-aware operators
Integrated both into IngestWizard with dynamic step routing
Added setupGuide support for secret fields
Improved Source ID labeling to Source Name
